--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "dishpanhandninja" <foxmanroar1@a...> 
wrote:
> Sabre:
> 
> Sabre stood outside Maximal HQ. He didn't feel like he belonged, he 
> was a beastmachine, no faction until now, but his mother had been a 
> decepticon before she was changed... He was alone again, Wing and 
> Rave were wounded and Convoy had no memory of his lefe as a 
> beastmachine... His sister was missing, NightViper was now a 
pred... 
> He growled and slamed his fist ont the shield shocking 
> himself. "RRrrrr ahhh!" He slumped to the ground rapping his wings 
> around his shoulder... 
> 
> Convoy walked out. "There going to be ok."
> 
> Sabre smiled. "I knew they'd make it, but i thank you anyway... 
They 
> two sat their looking at the sky. "So what happens now?"
> 
> Convoy smiled. "I'm as new at this as you kid." He patted sabre on 
> the back, "buck up kid, someones coming."

Wheeljack-X::

"Heya, boyos, what's happening?" Jackie come out and plunks himself 
down alongside the pair.
